page.title: 18TRANSPORT PATTERNS...RAIL
page.content: The main rail line from{LONDON }to{ {HOLYHEAD}crosses the northern part of the block.The former {FORYD STATION} which was in use when the line was operated by the{LONDON AND {NORTHWESTERN RAILWAY},has long since become derelict and only a few fragments of buildings remain.A { {branch line }along the Vale of Clwyd from Rhyl to Corwen operated until the early 1960's,and also a small{ {industrial line}ran off this to the quarry at St.George and continued to the dockside in the Foryd Harbour.
